messages.message:
Hey team - the migration to *Node 22* is finally complete! :tada: Make sure to re-sync your sandboxes for the easiest transition, or follow the steps here (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1747404563451399) to manually install Node 22

There shouldnâ€™t be any major changes besides some slight performance improvements, but please let me know if you run into any snags!
